Prerequisite: Ranger, Reaving Axe Student feat

Benefit: When you are attacking with a one-handed axe and you have proficiency with that weapon, you gain the following two benefits.

Whenever you score a critical hit against an enemy, you also knock that enemy prone, and the first time it stands up before the end of your next turn, it provokes an opportunity attack.

You can use Strength instead of Dexterity for attack rolls and damage rolls when using a power associated with this feat.

Associated Powers:

Arrow of Vengeance

,

Bloodlust Strike: Only when used as a ranged attack

Hawk's Talon: Only when used as a ranged attack

Hobbling Shot

,

Lightning Shot

,

Thwarting Shot

Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 127.
